word_mean: ［法］肉汤：动物肉制成的汤液，用作食物制品或细菌培养基。用作细菌培养基时，一般称液体培养基(broｔh)。各种培养基见Culｔure Media表

sentence.Network_en: Dishes of bouillon were brought in hot and hot.
sentence.Network_cn: 一道道热气腾腾的肉汤被端上来.

sentence.Network_en: Add lentils , chicken bouillon and water to the skillet.
sentence.Network_cn: 加入扁豆, 鸡精和水.

sentence.Network_en: To poach fish, you can make your own court - bouillon or simply use vegetable or chicken stock.
sentence.Network_cn: 煮鱼时, 可以自由发挥,随心配制专属自己的高汤,也可以简单一点,只放些蔬菜或鸡汤.

derivation.yuyuan_name: French, literally liquid in which something has boiled', from bouillir 'to boil'

entry.tran: （用肉和骨头或蔬菜煮的）高汤，清汤
entry.def: Bouillon is a liquid made by boiling meat and bones or vegetables in water and used to make soups and sauces.
